src:
The Next Invincibles, Harapan Semu Liverpool di Mata Jurgen Klopp
03 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jurgen Klopp mengisyaratkan bahwa Liverpool mungkin tidak akan bisa menutup musim ini tanpa kekalahan. Dia mencemaskan performa timnya yang beruntung bisa mengalahkan Aston Villa 2-1, Sabtu (2/11/2019) dini hari WIB tadi.
Liverpool cukup kesulitan pada pertandingan itu, menanti gol yang tidak kunjung tiba sampai pengujung laga. Mereka tertinggal 0-1 di babak pertama, lalu berbalik unggul lewat dua gol krusial di menit ke-87 dan 90+4.
Bagaimanapun, menang tetap menang, Liverpool bertahan di puncak klasemen sementara dengan keunggulan 6 poin dari Man City. Klopp tahu timnya sudah mendapatkan tambahan 3 poin penting.
Kendati demikian, dia tidak yakin Liverpool bisa melaju terus tanpa kekalahan. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
The Next Invincibles, Liverpool's Pseudo Hope in the Eyes of Jurgen Klopp
Nov 3 2019, 12:30 by Bola.net
Jurgen Klopp has hinted that Liverpool might not be able to close the season without defeat. He worried about the performance of his team who were lucky to beat Aston Villa 2-1 on Saturday (11/02/2019) early this morning WIB.
Liverpool had enough difficulty in the match, waiting for a goal that did not arrive until the end of the fight. They left behind 0-1 in the first round, then turned ahead through two crucial goals in the 87th minute and 90 + 4.
However, win still wins, Liverpool stay on top of the standings with a 6-point advantage over Man City. Klopp knows his team has gotten an additional 3 important points.
Nevertheless, he was not sure Liverpool could go on without defeat. Read below, Bolaneters!
